A file storer

A file storer

FileStorer

Format

An object of class R6ClassGenerator of length 25.

new()

Create a new FileStorer

path

Local file system path. Default ''

version

Version of storer. Currently ignored but required for compatability. Default NULL

getDirectory()

Get the directory path of this storer

getMain()

Get the main file, if specified

getFiles()

List files within this storer

getInfo()

Get information about this storer:

dir

The absolute file sytem path of the storer's directory

main

The main file, if specified

files

A list of file in the storer

readFile()

Read content from the file at path

path

Path within the storer

writeFile()

Write content to the file at path

path

Path within the storer

content

Content to write

deleteFile()

Delete the file at path

path

Path within the storer

Contents

  • new()
  • getDirectory()
